title: Reaching new audiences through an effective media campaign to promote a brand partnership | Torchbox

metadata.description: Our latest case study tells the story of WWT's exciting partnership with Bing, the award-winning animated children's TV series produced by Acamar Films. We supported WWT with a paid digital ad campaign, encouraging families across the UK to explore their local wetland centres.
